name: Penny Arcade -- Classic Look
description: Modifies the Penny Arcade main page to use the classic purple-and-orange look.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("www.penny-arcade.com") {

body, html
{ background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,') !important
}

.page
{ width: auto !important
}

.page .header
{ background: #404096 !important
; height: 30px !important
; padding: 0.2em 0 0 0.3em !important
; width: auto !important
}

#navigation
{ display: inline !important
; float: left !important
; padding-top: 0.3em !important
}

#navigation > li, #navigation > li > a
{ display: inline !important
; height: auto !important
; position: relative !important
; top : auto !important
}

#navigation > li > a
{ text-decoration: none !important
; font-weight: bold !important
}

#navigation > li > a:hover
{ text-decoration: underline !important
}

#nav_home, #nav_comic, #nav_archive, #nav_forums,
#nav_store, #nav_pax, #nav_patv, #nav_cpc, #nav_other
{ left: auto !important
; width: auto !important
; margin-left: 0.8em !important
}

#nav_other_menu
{ right: 0 !important
; position: absolute !important
; top: 1em !important
; width: 140px !important
}

#nav_other_menu > li, #nav_other_menu > li > a
{ width: 140px !important
}

.page .header .mailinglist
{ display: none !important
}

.page .header img.logo
{ display: none !important
}

.page .header > a
{ display: block !important
; float: left !important
; width: 39px !important
; height: 24px !important
; background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,') !important
}

.funding-vertical, .funding-horizontal, .promo, .promos-horizontal
{ display: none !important
}

.content, .content .posts, .post .title, .post .body
{ width: auto !important
}

.content
{ left: 0 !important
; padding: 0 0.3em 0 0.3em !important
}

/* Old post colors */
.post
{ border: 2px solid #F9A906 !important
; background-color: #404096 !important
}

.post .title
{ background: none !important
; border: none !important
; height: auto !important
; overflow: visible !important
}

.post .postheader
{ height: auto !important
; padding: 0.2em 0 0.7em 0 !important
}

.post .postheader .metainfo,
.post .postheader h1
{ margin: 0 !important
}

.post .postheader .metainfo br
{ display: none !important
}

.post .body
{ background: none !important
; padding-top: 0 !important
}

/* Float avatars */
.post .title .avatar
{ float: left !important
; background-color: #949494 !important
; position: relative !important
; padding: 0 5px 5px 0 !important
; border: 2px solid #F9A906 !important
; border-width: 0 2px 2px 0 !important
; margin: -2px 0.5em 0 -2px !important
}

}
